org.apache.xpath

Interface WhitespaceStrippingElementMatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecimalFormatProperties, ElemAnalyzeString, ElemApplyImport, ElemApplyTemplates, ElemAttribute, ElemAttributeSet, ElemCallTemplate, ElemCatch, ElemCharacterMap, ElemChoose, ElemComment, ElemContextItem, ElemCopy, ElemCopyOf, ElemDocument, ElemElement, ElemEmpty, ElemEvaluate, ElemExsltFuncResult, ElemExsltFunction, ElemExtensionCall, ElemExtensionDecl, ElemExtensionScript, ElemFallback, ElemForEach, ElemForEachGroup, ElemFork, ElemFunction, ElemIf, ElemImportSchema, ElemIterate, ElemIterateBreak, ElemIterateNextIteration, ElemIterateOnCompletion, ElemLiteralResult, ElemMatchingSubstring, ElemMerge, ElemMergeAction, ElemMergeKey, ElemMergeSource, ElemMessage, ElemNonMatchingSubstring, ElemNumber, ElemOtherwise, ElemOutputCharacter, ElemParam, ElemPI, ElemResultDocument, ElemSequence, ElemSort, ElemSourceDocument, ElemTemplate, ElemTemplateElement, ElemText, ElemTextLiteral, ElemTry, ElemUnknown, ElemUse, ElemValueOf, ElemVariable, ElemVariablePsuedo, ElemWhen, ElemWithParam, KeyDeclaration, NamespaceAlias, OutputProperties, ProcessorCharacterMap, ProcessorCharacters, ProcessorExsltFuncResult, ProcessorExsltFunction, ProcessorImport, ProcessorImportSchema, ProcessorInclude, ProcessorLRE, ProcessorStylesheetDoc, ProcessorStylesheetElement, ProcessorTemplateElem, ProcessorText, ProcessorUnknown, Stylesheet, StylesheetComposed, StylesheetRoot, WhiteSpaceInfo, WhitespaceInfoPaths, XSLTElementProcessor

    public interface WhitespaceStrippingElementMatcher
    A class that implements this interface can tell if a given element should strip whitespace nodes from it's children.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canStripWhiteSpace()
      Get information about whether or not whitespace can be stripped.
      boolean shouldStripWhiteSpace(XPathContext support, org.w3c.dom.Element targetElement)
      Get information about whether or not an element should strip whitespace.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldStripWhiteSpace

        boolean shouldStripWhiteSpace(XPathContext support,
                              org.w3c.dom.Element targetElement)
                       throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Get information about whether or not an element should strip whitespace.
        Parameters:
        support - The XPath runtime state.
        targetElement - Element to check
        Returns:
        true if the whitespace should be stripped.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        See Also:
        strip in XSLT Specification
